search.notEnough: Your query must contain at least 3 characters

assistant.name: Twake Assistant
assistant.default_error: There was an error, please try again

message.welcome: How can I help you today?

twake_knowledges.desc_drive: Selected items will be used to answer your questions.
twake_knowledges.desc_mail: Selected emails will be used to answer your questions.
twake_knowledges.desc_chat: Selected messages will be used to answer your questions.

assistant_create.title: Create Assistant

basic_info.description: Customize your assistant's identity and behavior to match your specific needs.
basic_info.name: Name
basic_info.instructions_placeholder: What does this assistant do? How should it behave? What should it avoid doing?
basic_info.knowledge_base_placeholder: Conversations may reveal some or all of the files that have been uploaded.

provider_selection.description: Choose the AI model that best matches your requirements.

openrag.description: Work with drive files, chat, email from your Twake Workplace

google.description: Google's most capable model for text and multimodal tasks

openai.description: Most capable GPT model, great for complex reasoning and creative tasks

mistral_ai.description: Efficient and powerful model with strong performance

anthropic.description: Helpful, harmless, and honest AI assistant with strong reasoning

meta.description: Open-source large language model for various applications

provider_selection.external_warning: Your data will be processed on external servers. This mode does not provide enhanced security protections.

configuration.description: Enter provider URL, model and your API key to configure the new assistant. Your key will be stored securely.
configuration.custom_provider_description: Configure your custom AI provider settings
configuration.generate: You can generate a new API key from your %{provider} account dashboard.

assistant_create.configure_api_key_description: Enter provider URL, model and your API key to configure the new assistant. Your key will be stored securely.

assistant_delete.title: Delete AI Assistant
assistant_delete.content: Are you sure you want to delete %{name}? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove this assistant from your Twake.
